channel.title: Make it so a door needs crystal key to open

item.title: Make it so a door needs crystal key to open
item.dc:creator: @scootkid scootkid
item.description:
@scootkid wrote:

i have this door to replace it so it opens but how would i change it so i can make it so u have to use a crystal key with it to open?
Thanks so much

case 2627: if(objectX == 2716 && objectY == 3472) { ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,objectID =+ 2, -1); }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 03, 2008, 04:19:22 PM[/size][hr]Common i need helpâ€¦
